duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect, qualify, and sell B2B catering and gifting to new and lapsed corporate customers within an assigned geographical market.
Build relationships with new B2B customers and encourage frequent repeat business.
Sell products and gift cards to corporate customers by articulating the gifting value proposition and benefit of products.
Achieve assigned sales targets on a monthly and trimester basis.
Complete assigned number of sales driving activities on a daily basis such as number of calls, visits, and emails.
Record work completed daily in designated reporting system.
Accept orders, enter orders into the point of sale system, and submit orders on a timely basis for fulfillment.
Create and maintain prospecting lists, provide customer service assistance to corporate clients, and generate and submit telemarketing activity reports on a regular basis.
Schedule and conduct Lunch and Learn seminars with businesses.
Place follow-up calls to customers prior to order receipt and after order receipt to ensure customer satisfaction with the process and purchase.
Report customer issues and major changes to the General Manager for resolution.
Build relationships with General Managers in the market to gain a better understanding of the market and the strengths of the stores.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree or equivalent work experience preferred.
